name: Electric Full Face Snorkel Mask for Adults, Snorkeling Gear with Latest Dry Top System, Patented Airflow System with Fan Assistance, 180° Panoramic Foldable Design, Anti-Fog & Anti-Leak
short_description: COMFORTABLE BREATHING EXPERIENCE – Breathe naturally and comfortably through your nose and mouth. Our electric snorkel mask features a patented electric-assisted breathing system. Up to 600% better work of breathing than standard mounted snorkel designs. Powered by an 8,000 RPM micro-fan, it provides continuous airflow to reduce breathing resistance and CO₂ buildup, keeping you comfortable during long snorkel sessions

SAFETY FIRST – Thoroughly tested and approved, this full face snorkel mask exceeds safety standards. Through meticulous iteration, we’ve improved the airflow, visibility, fit, camera mount, and overall safety of the full-face snorkeling experience. The airtight seal, high-quality materials, and low CO₂ levels (<0.29%) ensure that your underwater adventure is safe and worry-free, no matter the conditions

IMPORTANT SIZING TIPS – Available in two sizes, this mask is designed for a perfect fit with ultra-soft silicone and anti-leak technology. Be sure to measure from the bridge of your nose (between your eyes) to the tip of your chin. Measure along the side of your nose, not over the top. Follow the sizing chart. If you are between sizes, it’s usually best to select the smaller size. Be sure to test it in a pool before your trip

ENJOY THE 180 PANORAMIC VIEW – Upgrade your snorkel gear with our 20% larger 180° panoramic view, providing you with a truly immersive underwater experience. The upward-angled snorkel tube stays above the water effortlessly, offering you greater freedom of movement for your head. Equipped with a detachable action camera mount, this full face snorkel mask lets you record your underwater explorations easily

ANTI-FOG AND ANTI-LEAK DESIGN – Featuring a full face snorkel anti-fog system, our mask integrates dual float valves and a built-in fan to maintain optimal airflow. Whether you’re diving into clear waters, exploring coral reefs, or enjoying extended snorkel trips, this mask ensures a clear view and a secure, ergonomic fit that prevents discomfort and leaks, letting you fully capture the experience

name: OTS Guardian Full Face Mask
short_description: The Guardian Full Face Mask is comfortable and is easy to use for anyone. The low profile visor ensures great visibility. The ABV valve helps preserve your air when on the surface.

Diving becomes effortless especially in cold water. The Guardian helps keep your face warm and being able to breathe out your nose helps keep you from getting a dry throat, which is common for divers who have long duration dives.
Women and men both found the mask to be extremely comfortable. In some cases, women who could not dive any other full face mask were able to easily dive the Guardian

The mask bag was specifically designed for a full face mask. The design actually helps maintain the mask. The bag has large drain holes located on the bottom and a vent screen on the top. This helps in the drying process after diving.
The Guardian was designed with a double seal, allowing for the comfort of both small and large faces.
product_description: With over 60 years of diving experience, and having sold almost every type of Full Face Mask on the market, it was easy to see there was a need for something better. As a result OTS designed the Guardian Full Face Mask. A common problem with most FFM on the market today is the seal. The lack of a good seal causes the diver to use air quicker and can interfere with the divers ability to hear if using underwater communications. With that in mind, the GFFM was designed around a double seal allowing for the comfort of both small and large faces. Equalizing is a challenge for all full face masks one size does not fit all. In order to ensure everyone can equalize, we have put together an Equalizing Kit, which comes with every Guardian full face mask. The kit consists of two bases. One is a standard size without any holes. It can be adjusted up or down to fit as necessary. The other base has two holes, which allow for different size pads that can be added. In the event the standard base does not work for you, one of the pads and the other base should fit the bill. The Guardians low profile allows superb visibility and its easily removable 2nd stage regulator works great for storage and easy maintenance. The Ambient Breathing Valve allows the user to breathe ambient air at the surface, conserving your tank air. It is simple to use and its low profile keeps it out of the way. Adjustable head straps with robust hardware make this mask what it is, simply the best. We have also included a full face mask bag. The mask bag was designed to help keep your mask in the right drying position, keeping water from pooling in your 2nd stage regulator. It also has vents to keep good ventilation helping to stop mildew and drain holes to let water drain away from the mask. Lots of storage pockets as well. The bag has a carrying handle as well as a shoulder strap. The Guardian is fast becoming a standard with Search & Recovery, Law Enforcement, Commercial and Recreational divers alike.

name: Full Face Snorkel Mask, Snorkeling Gear for Adults, Scuba Mask Diving Dry Top Snorkel Gear with Detachable Camera Mount, 180° Panoramic View Anti-Leak Anti-Fog Travel Package
short_description: Full Face Snorkel Mask with 180° Panoramic View: Unlike traditional snorkel masks, this full-face design lets you breathe naturally through your mouth or nose while snorkeling. The mask features clear, flat lenses that prevent distortion, reduce glare, and provide a wide, comfortable view of the underwater world.

Dry Top Safety Breathing System: The snorkel mask features three fully independent air channels that maximize airflow and continuously circulate fresh air. This design effectively prevents the re-inhalation of exhaled CO₂, ensuring safer breathing and providing you with a comfortable, worry-free snorkeling experience.

Anti-Fog & Leak-Proof Design: This adult snorkel mask uses a separate inhalation and exhalation channel system to effectively prevent fogging for clear underwater views. The soft, hypoallergenic silicone skirt forms a secure, leak-free seal around your face, keeping water out and ensuring a comfortable snorkeling experience.

Removable Camera Mount & Foldable Design: This snorkel mask set includes a detachable camera mount, allowing you to capture and share your underwater adventures with ease. Its unique foldable design makes it compact, space-saving, and travel-friendly—an ideal choice for your next beach vacation.

Size Selection: Measure from the bridge of your nose to the bottom of your chin to choose the right size—S/M for under 4.72 inches or L/XL for over 4.72 inches. For any snorkeling questions, our team is here to help.

name: OTS Spectrum Full Face Mask
short_description: Scuba Full Face Mask
product_description: The Spectrum Full Face Mask provides a simple method to adapt your own regulator to the mask by eliminating the bite down mouthpiece (US Only) and tying your own reg in with the rest of the FFM. With the Spectrum Full Face Mask, Ocean Technology Systems created the best Full Face Mask on the market that allows divers to user their own regulators and eliminating the heavy cost associated with standard FFMs, without sacrificing luxury. The Spectrum Full Face Mask provides a simple method to adapt your own regulator to the mask by eliminating the bite down mouthpiece (US Only) and tying your own reg in with the rest of the FFM. This allows for some of the best features of our other Full Face Mask : no jaw fatigue, no dry mouth, double seal for a better fit, five point head harness and clear communications. Specifications: OTS Spectrum Full-Face Mask is tested to a maximum diving depth of 50m according to EN 250:2014** OTS Spectrum Full-Face Mask is designed for water temperatures below 10°C and is suitable for cold-water diving applications. Ultimately, cold water performance is dictated by 2nd stage regulator being used. OTS Spectrum Full-Face Mask is tested for diving applications with breathing air according to EN12021. OTS Spectrum Full-Face Mask has been tested according to the European standard EN 250:2014** **EN250:2014 refers to the 2014 European Standard for Respiratory equipment Open Circuit Self-Contained Air Diving Apparatus. **Please note the Spectrum is officially CE certified.

name: SEAC Magica Full Face Snorkeling Mask Comfortable for Smaller Faces
short_description: Plastic
Imported
WIDE VIEW - Experience unparalleled underwater clarity with a full-face design, offering an expansive field of vision for an immersive snorkeling adventure.
COMFORTABLE FIT - Designed for children aged 6 and up, this mask ensures a secure and comfortable fit, promoting extended wear without discomfort.
DURABLE MATERIAL - Constructed with lightweight and durable materials, this snorkel mask is built to withstand rigorous use and provide lasting performance.
EASY BREATHING - The innovative full-face design facilitates natural breathing through both the nose and mouth, enhancing comfort and reducing effort while snorkeling.
ANTI-FOG - Enjoy consistently clear views with advanced anti-fog technology, ensuring your underwater exploration remains uninterrupted and vivid.
product_description: Smaller size for maximum fun! The Seac Magica Junior is an integral snorkeling mask suitable for children aged 6 and up. The shell of the Seac Magica Junior full face mask has reduced dimensions: this way the mask is lighter, improves comfort and is more pleasant for smaller faces. The Seac Magica Junior also offers a perfect fit thanks to the adjustable elastic tissue straps that are both on the upper and lower part of the head. Like all SEAC full face masks, the Seac Magica Junior is equipped with our patented breathing system (WO 2019/053577 A1) which allows the perfect separate ducting of the incoming and outgoing air. Breathing is natural, like out of the water in a resting situation. The residual CO₂ level are well below the guide limits. The 180° panoramic screen does not tarnish. The snorkel has bright colors on the end to be clearly visible on the mirror of water. The dry top system prevents the entry of water from the snorkel in case of accidental immersion. SEAC full face masks are made ONLY for snorkeling. SEAC had its full-face masks tested by a third-party laboratory to certify the residual CO2 content while breathing [Certified by ITALCERT S. r. l. - date of issue: 2019-10-25 - Notified Body n°0426 - Test report n°PPE156RP2739]

【Foldable and Portable】Enjoy worry-free storage and travel with our foldable snorkel mask. Easily folds up to store compactly in your suitcase and easily assembles and disassembles for every snorkeling adventure.

【Medical Grade Materials & Size Options】Our snorkel masks are made of high-quality PC and medical grade silicone, non-toxic and safe for your skin. Choose size S/M or L/XL based on measurement from bridge of nose to base of chin for a comfortable, secure fit, be sure to measure along the side of the nose from the bridge of the nose (between the eyes) to the tip of the chin, while Not over the top.

name: Mini Scuba Tank with Snorkel Mask 0.5L Inflatable Diving Tank with Full Face Diving Mask Pony Bottle Backup Diving Air Tank Suits for Recreational Snorkeling Shallow Diving
short_description: 【Clever Combination of Snorkeling and Diving】 When using this diving equipment on the surface, a snorkeling mask can be used for normal snorkeling through a snorkel. Once underwater, the attached 0.5L diving tank will provide air and allow you to breathe freely underwater for about 6 minutes. Please note: The maximum dive depth is 30 feet, and the depth of the dive, the temperature, and the breathing rate all affect the breathing time.

【Fine and Excellent Quality】The scuba tank is made of 6061 aviation aluminum, and the three-layer process of washing casting, frosting and sandblasting is adopted, which makes it have better corrosion resistance and better resist the erosion of seawater. The inhalation and exhalation channels of the snorkeling mask are separated, so the exhaled CO₂ and residual O₂ can be quickly expelled from the outlet, allowing for smoother breathing underwater.

【New Design】Remove one of the snorkeling tubes of the snorkeling mask and connect the diving tank with a joint to facilitate the replacement of the spare cylinder at any time. The snorkeling mask uses a flat lens that gives you a wide field of view of 180°, so you won't have a distorted vision or dizziness. The full-face snorkeling mask comes with an action camera mount so you can record the joyful moments of your dive as a memento.

【Free Combination】The full-face snorkeling mask and diving tank can be used individually or in combination with the situation to experience the latest snorkeling mode. When the valve head of the diving tank is separated from the body of the diving tank, you can take it on a plane to follow you to dive around the world, which is simply the most enjoyable thing for diving enthusiasts.

【User Services】What you get: 0.5L scuba tank (silicone mouthpiece included), connector, full face snorkel mask (two snorkels included), mini hand pump, user manual and necessary replacement accessories. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us and we will reply within 24 hours.
